mapper.sql: id, mission_code, ad_id, chat_pet_id, create_time, state, finish_time,invitee_wx_fan_id
mapper.update:
update e_chat_pet_personal_mission
mission_code = #{missionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chat_pet_id = #{chatPetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update e_chat_pet_personal_mission set mission_code = #{missionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chat_pet_id = #{chatPetId}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invitee_wx_fan_id = #{inviteeWxFanId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM e_chat_pet_personal_mission WHERE ad_id = #{adId} AND chat_pet_id = #{chatPetId}
